handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive summer destination analysis for Thailand. Detailed insights for content creation are attached, focusing on pricing, motivation, and market specifics for family and youth segments.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use summer-specific destination trends and actionable insights for Kupibilet messaging and offers. Highlight Samui beaches, pricing advantages, family/youth orientation, and summer campaign brand visuals.
